channel.title: ~Project Scape v3.0~
channel.description:
I have currently released version 2.0. Version 3.0 is being edited but i could use some help from coders.
~Easy Tasks~ Fix bug in farming where you can't go past level 1 Fix some bugs with shops Remove useless npc's and mods Fix some bugs
~Medium Tasks~ Add more npc drops to the mods Add full runecrafting to the server Add full slayer Reduce lagg by removing useless commands/objects
~Hard Tasks~ Add weapon specials Add pest control Add rune defender mini game Add torso mini game
~Current Coders~ -none-
